ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Digest Number 825
ygData.msgSnippet: Plus, although I missed Charming two Giants against each other (never had the patience to find two of them at once), I m now Fear/Chaining single SGs, Specters
ygData.messageBody:
Plus, although I missed Charming two Giants against each other (never had
the
patience to find two of them
at once), I'm now Fear/Chaining single SGs, Specters and kobolds. A little
tedious, but better than no
exp! I fear/chained Terrorantula last night, even. Note: Fear has such a
small radius, that you have to
stand right *under* this spider to make it work. ;)

-----

I've been soloing the giant skels and drakes in Rathe Mtns using the chains,
fear, DDD combo. Works great as long as you dont lose track of your timing.
Im thinking of trying it on cyclops, just to see if I can.

I've also been playing around with charm on the giant skels. (Never had the
guts to try it before now) After watching a bard charming HG's solo, (first
time I've ever seen this done) it inspired me to attempt it. I do, however
see one major problem with this: He is constantly training other people in
the zone. Very not cool.

On a side note, I grouped up with a necro in my guild and we killed cyclops
non stop. I played hymn for him while he had his call of bones spell up,
and he was never out of mana. DDD stacks with the necro DoT's, and his pet
would just cut through them like a hot knife through warm butter. Would have
like to try that on hill giants.

-Treehugger and Songmaker
